mapper.select: SELECT *,COUNT(post.`communityId`) FROM community INNER JOIN post ON community.`communityId` = post.`communityId` AND date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) <= date(post.postTime) GROUP BY post.`communityId` ORDER BY COUNT(post.`communityId`) DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT post.*,COUNT(comment.`postId`) FROM post, comment WHERE post.`postId` = comment.`postId` AND date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) <= date(comment.commentTime) GROUP BY comment.`postId` ORDER BY COUNT(comment.`postId`) DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM post WHERE post.`communityId` = #{communityId} ORDER BY post.`postTime` DESC
SELECT accountName FROM account WHERE accountId IN ( SELECT accountId from post WHERE post.`postId` = #{postId} )

SELECT comment.*, account.`accountId`, account.`accountName`, account.`accountAvatar` FROM comment INNER JOIN account ON comment.`accountId` = account.`accountId` AND comment.`postId` = #{postId} ORDER BY comment.`commentTime` ASC
